evidence: The standard library's argparse module was introduced in Python 3.2.
The logging module was added to the standard library in Python 2.2.

argparse.notes: The argparse module was introduced in Python 3.2 and is not available in older versions.

evidence: The logging module was added to the standard library in Python 2.2.
The WARNING level was introduced in Python 2.4.

os.notes: The os module has been part of the standard library since Python 2.0.

evidence: The getpass module was added to the standard library in Python 2.4.
The getuser() function was introduced in Python 2.7.
The pprint module was added to the standard library in Python 2.4.
The PrettyPrinter class was introduced in Python 2.7.
The subprocess module was added to the standard library in Python 2.4.
The Popen class was introduced in Python 2.7.
The ftrack module was added to the standard library in Python 2.4.
The Task class and related functions were introduced in Python 2.7.
The djvviewer module was added to the standard library in Python 2.4.
The register(), discover() and launch() functions were introduced in Python 2.7.
